api/ArrayTest.ArrayTest.html.title: Class ArrayTest | BOOSE Picasso
api/ArrayTest.ArrayTest.html.summary: Class ArrayTest Namespace ArrayTest Assembly ArrayTest.dll ArrayTest class is the Unit Test for the Boose functions of Array(), Peek(), and Poke(). It tests several cases: single function, multi-line function, and exception throwing. It checks with parsing the processed input to stored program. Then compares with the final destination the cursor is at. [TestClass] public sealed class ArrayTest Inheritance object ArrayTest Inherited Members object.Equals(object) object.Equals(object, object) object.GetHashCode() object.GetType() object.ReferenceEquals(object, object) object.ToString() Methods Array_ShouldWork_Int() Array_ShouldWork_Int() tests the Array() function, and check whether the result is as expected. [TestMethod] public void Array_ShouldWork_Int() Setup() Setup() is to initialise the environment to do the testing. [TestInitialize] public void Setup()

api/BOOSE_Project.AppArray.html.summary: Class AppArray Namespace BOOSE_Project Assembly BOOSE_Project.dll AppArray class extends the AppArray command in BOOSE. It provides parameters checking for the array command. When there are actions to the array, it processes the array by recognising whether it is to get or set the value of an array item. public class AppArray : Array, ICommand Inheritance object Command Evaluation Array AppArray Implements ICommand Derived AppPeek AppPoke Inherited Members Array.PEEK Array.POKE Array.type Array.rows Array.columns Array.valueInt Array.valueReal Array.intArray Array.realArray Array.pokeValue Array.peekVar Array.rowS Array.columnS Array.row Array.column Array.ArrayRestrictions() Array.Compile() Array.Execute() Array.ProcessArrayParametersExecute(bool) Array.SetIntArray(int, int, int) Array.SetRealArray(double, int, int) Array.GetIntArray(int, int) Array.GetRealArray(int, int) Array.Rows Array.Columns Evaluation.expression Evaluation.evaluatedExpression Evaluation.varName Evaluation.value Evaluation.ProcessExpression(string) Evaluation.Expression Evaluation.VarName Evaluation.Value Evaluation.Local Command.IsDouble Command.program Command.parameterList Command.parameters Command.paramsint Command.Set(StoredProgram, string) Command.ProcessParameters(string) Command.ToString() Command.Program Command.Name Command.ParameterList Command.Parameters Command.Paramsint object.Equals(object) object.Equals(object, object) object.GetHashCode() object.GetType() object.MemberwiseClone() object.ReferenceEquals(object, object) Constructors AppArray() AppArray() is the blank constructor for factory initialisation. public AppArray() Methods CheckParameters(string[]) CheckParameters() checks the parameter of the array command. It checks the token number of the command line, which checks if the command is valid. public override void CheckParameters(string[] parameterList) Parameters parameterList string[] stores the parameters of the Array command. Exceptions CommandException reports the error where the command expression is invalid. ProcessArrayParametersCompile(bool) ProcessArrayParametersCompile() processes expression that interacts with the array. It detects the action, and compiles the command for both peek and poke action. protected override void ProcessArrayParametersCompile(bool poke) Parameters poke bool true if its poke; false if its peek Exceptions CommandException reports the error messages accordingly to each event

api/BOOSE_Project.AppCanvas.html.summary: Class AppCanvas Namespace BOOSE_Project Assembly BOOSE_Project.dll AppCanvas class implements the ICanvas interface. Sets all the values to default using the Set() method. Including the drawing bitmap size, graphics object, pen, brush, font and initial position of the drawing pointer. public AppCanvas(int xSize, int ySize) Parameters xSize int the width of the drawing bitmap ySize int the height of the drawing bitmap Fields drawingBitmap public Bitmap drawingBitmap Field Value Bitmap font public Font font Field Value Font fontSize public int fontSize Field Value int graphics public Graphics graphics Field Value Graphics pen public Pen pen Field Value Pen penColor public Color penColor Field Value Color solidBrush public SolidBrush solidBrush Field Value SolidBrush Properties PenColour PenColour getter and setter for the color of the drawing pointer. public object PenColour { get; set; } Property Value object Xpos Xpos getter and setter for the X position of the drawing pointer. public int Xpos { get; set; } Property Value int Ypos Ypos getter and setter for the Y position of the drawing pointer. public int Ypos { get; set; } Property Value int Methods Circle(int, bool) Circle() draws a circle at current position with specified radius. public void Circle(int radius, bool filled) Parameters radius int the specified parameters to decide the size of the circle filled bool whether filling the shape or not Clear() Clear() clears the canvas by setting the background color to default. public void Clear() DrawTo(int, int) DrawTo() draws a line from current drawing pointer to specified x,y. Leave the drawing pointer at x,y. public void DrawTo(int x, int y) Parameters x int x position y int y position MoveTo(int, int) MoveTo() moves the drawing pointer to specified x,y. public void MoveTo(int x, int y) Parameters x int x position y int y position Rect(int, int, bool) Rect() draws a rectangle at current position with specified width and height. public void Rect(int width, int height, bool filled) Parameters width int the width of the rectangle height int the height of the rectangle filled bool choose whether to fill the rectangle shape or not Reset() Reset() resets the x y position to 0,0. public void Reset() Set(int, int) Set() sets and initialise the: drawing bitmap and graphics objects default x,y position of the drawing cursor pen, pen color, solid brush font, font size public void Set(int width, int height) Parameters width int the width of the drawing bitmap height int the height of the drawing bitmap SetColour(int, int, int) SetColour() sets the color of the pen, and the pen brush object in RGB format. public void SetColour(int red, int green, int blue) Parameters red int Red parameter in RGB green int Green parameter in RGB blue int Blue parameter in RGB Tri(int, int) Tri() draws an isosceles triangle at current position with specified width and height. public void Tri(int width, int height) Parameters width int the width of the triangle height int the height of the triangle WriteText(string) WriteText() writes a specified text at current pointer position. public void WriteText(string text) Parameters text string the declared text to be draw on the canvas getBitmap() getBitmap() provides the drawing bitmap of the canvas. public object getBitmap() Returns object the drawing bitmap of the canvas

api/BOOSE_Project.AppElse.html.summary: Class AppElse Namespace BOOSE_Project Assembly BOOSE_Project.dll AppElse class overwrites the Else command in BOOSE. serves for if-else conditional statements. public class AppElse : CompoundCommand, ICommand Inheritance object Command Evaluation Boolean ConditionalCommand CompoundCommand AppElse Implements ICommand Inherited Members CompoundCommand.ReduceRestrictions() CompoundCommand.CorrespondingCommand ConditionalCommand.endLineNumber ConditionalCommand.EndLineNumber ConditionalCommand.Condition ConditionalCommand.LineNumber ConditionalCommand.CondType ConditionalCommand.ReturnLineNumber Boolean.BoolValue Evaluation.expression Evaluation.evaluatedExpression Evaluation.varName Evaluation.value Evaluation.ProcessExpression(string) Evaluation.Expression Evaluation.VarName Evaluation.Value Evaluation.Local Command.IsDouble Command.program Command.parameterList Command.parameters Command.paramsint Command.Set(StoredProgram, string) Command.ProcessParameters(string) Command.ToString() Command.Program Command.Name Command.ParameterList Command.Parameters Command.Paramsint object.Equals(object) object.Equals(object, object) object.GetHashCode() object.GetType() object.MemberwiseClone() object.ReferenceEquals(object, object) Constructors AppElse() AppElse() the blank constructor for factory instantiation. public AppElse() Properties CorrespondingEnd CorrespondingEnd getter and setter for the corresponding END command for the ELSE command. public AppEnd CorrespondingEnd { get; set; } Property Value AppEnd Methods CheckParameters(string[]) CheckParameters() checks the parameters for the ELSE command. public override void CheckParameters(string[] parameter) Parameters parameter string[] Exceptions CommandException Compile() Compile() compiles the ELSE command. removes the ELSE command from the program stack. updates line numbers for program control flow. adds back the ELSE command onto the program stack. public override void Compile() Execute() Execute() executes the ELSE command. api/BOOSE_Project.html.title: Namespace BOOSE_Project | BOOSE Picasso
api/BOOSE_Project.html.summary: Namespace BOOSE_Project Classes AppArray AppArray class extends the AppArray command in BOOSE. It provides parameters checking for the array command. When there are actions to the array, it processes the array by recognising whether it is to get or set the value of an array item. AppCanvas AppCanvas class implements the ICanvas interface. It provides several methods and properties to manage different operation in the drawing canvas. AppCircle AppCircle class implements the CommandOneParameter abstract class. Overrides the Execute() and CheckParameters() methods to draw a circle, and validates the parameters. AppDrawTo AppDrawTo class implements the CommandTwoParameters abstract class. Overrides the Execute() and CheckParameters() methods to draw a line, and validates the parameters. AppElse AppElse class overwrites the Else command in BOOSE. serves for if-else conditional statements. AppEnd AppEnd class extends the End command in BOOSE. detects the corresponding compound command to end. Supports If, While, For, and Method commands. AppFor AppFor class extends the For command in BOOSE. Overrides the base class ConditionalCommand. AppIf AppIf class extends the If command in BOOSE. AppInt AppInt class extends the Evaluation command in BOOSE. it handles integer variable declaration and checks for valid integer assignment. AppMethod AppMethod class extends the Method in BOOSE. it uses the original methods from the base class. AppMoveTo AppMoveTo class implements the CommandTwoParameters abstract class. Overrides the Execute() and CheckParameters() methods to move the drawing cursor, and validates the parameters. AppParser AppParser class extends the Parser class in BOOSE. overrides the ParseCommand() method to parse user input. AppPeek AppPeek class extends the AppArray command in BOOSE. It handles the PEEK command to assign a value to an array element. Uses the base class methods to process parameters for PEEK operation. AppPenColour AppPenColour class implements the CommandThreeParameters abstract class. Overrides the Execute() and CheckParameters() methods to change the pen color, and validates the parameters. AppPoke AppPoke class extends the AppArray command in BOOSE. It handles the POKE command to assign a value to an array element. Uses the base class methods to process parameters for POKE operation. AppReal AppReal class extends the Evaluation command in BOOSE. it handles Real variable declaration and checks for valid Real assignment. AppRect AppRect class implements the CommandTwoParameters abstract class. Overrides the Execute() and CheckParameters() methods to draw a rectangle, and validates the parameters. AppTri AppTri class implements the CommandTwoParameters abstract class. Overrides the Execute() and CheckParameters() methods to draw a triangle, and validates the parameters. AppWhile AppWhile class extends the While command in BOOSE. AppWrite AppWrite class implements the CanvasCommand abstract class. Overrides Execute() to evaluate its parameters, and draw a string on the canvas. Overrides CheckParameters() to validates the parameters. ThePicassoApp thePicassoApp class is a drawing app that does several basic operations. Such as: drawing shapes with mouse cursor or typed in commands, changing pen color and stroke width, and clearing the canvas. Additionally, it supports syntax highlighting in the text command input field.

api/DrawToTest.DrawToTest.html.title: Class DrawToTest | BOOSE Picasso
api/DrawToTest.DrawToTest.html.summary: Class DrawToTest Namespace DrawToTest Assembly DrawToTest.dll DrawToTest class is the Unit Test for the Boose DrawTo() function. It tests several cases: single function, multi-line function, and exception throwing. It checks with parsing the processed input to stored program. Then compares with the final destination the cursor is at.
